Layout/SpaceAroundEqualsInParameterDefau.description:
Description

Checks that the equals signs in parameter default assignments have or don't have surrounding space depending on configuration.
Layout/SpaceAroundEqualsInParameterDefau.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: space (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['space', 'no_space'] (type: list)
